# Daytona

> Daytona is a self-hosted and secure open source development environment manager.

## Docs

- [Configuration](https://daytona.io/docs/configuration)
- [Configuration Options](https://daytona.io/docs/configuration#configuration-options)
- [Environment Variables](https://daytona.io/docs/configuration#environment-variables)
- [Setting Environment Variables](https://daytona.io/docs/configuration#setting-environment-variables)
- [Configuration Precedence](https://daytona.io/docs/configuration#configuration-precedence)
- [Getting Started](https://daytona.io/docs/getting-started)
- [Install Daytona](https://daytona.io/docs/getting-started#install-daytona)
- [Set Up Your Environment Variables](https://daytona.io/docs/getting-started#set-up-your-environment-variables)
- [Install the Daytona SDK](https://daytona.io/docs/getting-started#install-the-daytona-sdk)
- [Write Code to Create a Sandbox](https://daytona.io/docs/getting-started#write-code-to-create-a-sandbox)
- [Execute Commands](https://daytona.io/docs/getting-started#execute-commands)
- [Start your Sandbox](https://daytona.io/docs/getting-started#start-your-sandbox)
- [Daytona Documentation](https://daytona.io/docs/index)
- [Quick Start](https://daytona.io/docs/index#quick-start)
- [Sandbox Persistence](https://daytona.io/docs/sandbox-persistence)
- [Understanding Sandbox States](https://daytona.io/docs/sandbox-persistence#understanding-sandbox-states)
- [Running](https://daytona.io/docs/sandbox-persistence#running)
- [Stopped](https://daytona.io/docs/sandbox-persistence#stopped)
- [Archived](https://daytona.io/docs/sandbox-persistence#archived)
- [Performance Considerations](https://daytona.io/docs/sandbox-persistence#performance-considerations)
